transcript:
I've got a quick question for you how
did you wake up today I was giving a
speech last week and I posed that
question so did you jump out of your bed
and say oh my god it's another day I'm
so excited for another day and obviously
it was a joke but most people laughed
and then I got serious and said why
didn't you wake up that way most people
wake up and live their entire day pissed
off and when you're sitting at the
checkout counter and you see someone and
in the cashier your ass how you doing
today in persons like oh I'm just
getting by the cashier is like yeah me
too why is that the automatic default
why do we have to have a reason to be
happy a reason to be excited I'll give
you a reason how about you effect you
just woke up today do you know how many
people did not wake up today so can you
find a reason to be happy for absolutely
no reason yes you can so anytime that
you're sitting there and you feel like
you might be feeling depressed you might
be feeling down or be sad or anything
like that why not put on music why not
dance naked in your bathroom for
absolutely no reason because you're
alive that's probably the best reason
that I can give you so what I want you
to take from this video today is to be
happy for absolutely no reason because
you can be sad or depressed for
absolutely no reason so if you can do
that why not change it and just be happy
for no reason why not be glad for no
reason why not just be completely
grateful that you're alive when most
people aren't for no reason that's what
I think you should be absolutely happy
about and absolutely excited about every
single day and if you live your life
this way what you'll notice is greater
things will start to come into your life
it'll be easier to be happier and you
will start to attract more happy people
into your life as well and get rid of
the negative ones so think about that
today share this with someone if you
love it and I hope that you guys have an
amazing day
